pkgmetadata.longdescription: Help Detect and Mitigate Bias in Machine Learning Models // The 'AI Fairness 360' https://aif360.mybluemix.net/ toolkit is an open-source library to help detect and mitigate bias in machine learning models. The AI Fairness 360 R package includes a comprehensive set of metrics for datasets and models to test for biases, explanations for these metrics, and algorithms to mitigate bias in datasets and models.
